editionStmt.edition: Die Transkription der Texte wurde unter Verwendung des "SvSal-Schemas für Werke" angefertigt.

sourceDesc.p: Born digital, erstellt am 2014-03-27, um 20:10 Uhr. Zuletzt aktualisiert am 2018-07-06, um 16:32 Uhr.

listChange.change: Added composed j with diaeresis character.
Added latin small letter u with circumflex.
Added latin small letter i with grave.
Added latin small letter g with macron.
Added precomposed paragraphus sign.
Added precomposed small letter p wit acute accent.
Deleted charq0307 due to repetition. chare682 remains as latin small letter q with dot above.
Add precomposed Latin small letter o with diaeresis.
Add precomposed Latin small letter e with tilde.
Add Latin small letter q with stroke and diaeresis.
Add several macron characters.
Add circumflex and grave char codes.
Renamed file to specialchars.xml.
Add small letters with grave, circumflex, open o, and o with tilde precomposed.
Added latin capital letter p with stroke through descender.
Add section for crosses, horizontal bars (en dash and em dash) etc.
Add small letter e with macron.
Add small letters with macron, and further special characters.
Localize metadata.
Scharfes S und andere Glyphen unterhalb von x00ff wieder hinzugenommen (wegen Umschaltung dipl./konst. Ansicht).
Mit Musterdeklaration aus W_Head_general angelegt

body.p: This is just dummy text - the meat is in the header (TEI/teiHeader/encodingDesc/charDecl).
